title: Can't install game
body: After taking forever to load in the first place, it sits at this screen then eventually errors. I have tried all attempts at running as admin, and all solutions online have to do with the game already being installed but I can't install it in the first place.

replies.body:
There are a few different things that could be causing this, however, you should be able to resolve this by working through our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). This is because that guide covers the most common solutions for patching issues and should only take a few minutes to go through.

Please let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking the steps in that guide.
What is the specific error and are you updating to 7.4 or downloading the game from scratch
